name: Thx, tank!
description:
Press tab to open the store and buy upgrades for your tank!

You can upgrade stuff indefinetely, so things can start getting out of control.

This game was made for a friend that loved the browser game called "Thanks Tanks", but was apparently taken down, so I decided to make my (not very close to the original) version of it, thus using this to enter the gift jam 2021

I also made this to practice for an exam, and this is also my first game in this page.

Have fun playing it!
